name: Gone Away (Raining Sideways)
description:
Try to feel at home after moving into a frozen cabin for a month. Which actions will make you feel more comfortable, and which will make you feel more alienated? This game was made during the 2019 Global Game Jam. The theme was "What Home Means to You" and the local diversifier was "Crisp."

Click or tap to advance the text and click on the large boxes to choose your next action, but be mindful of how your choices change the way you perceive your new home.

I was primarily responsible for the sound design and made all of the background tracks.

Happy Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/gone-away-happy

GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/gone-away
